solution_line_template: Carrie drove {miles_day1} + {additional_miles_day2} = <<{miles_day1}+{additional_miles_day2}={miles_day2}>>{miles_day2} miles on the second day
Carrie drove {miles_day1} + {miles_day2} + {miles_day3} + {miles_day4} = <<{miles_day1}+{miles_day2}+{miles_day3}+{miles_day4}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles for the whole trip.
